upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.10, 3.20, 3.30.
* Fixed a bug: With Parameter 28 set to disabled (Dimmer Scene Control - Off), after turning the lights on with a single click (upper paddle), the single click to turn off the lights (lower paddle) no longer worked.
* Fixed a bug: Z-Wave command now respects the custom brightness level set for single tap (parameters 18 and 23), instead of restoring the last brightness level.

* Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.10, 3.20.
* Separated ramp rate settings into 4 new parameters: ramp rate ON physical (13), ramp rate OFF physical (31), ramp rate ON Z-Wave (32), and ramp rate OFF Z-Wave (33).
* Adjust Double Tap (parameter 17) and Single Tap (parameter 18) behavior to match ZEN72 and ZEN77 dimmers.
* Improved the delay for on/off control from the dimmer paddle with scene control disabled.
* Fixed a bug: When the LED indicator is set to 'on when the load is on' (parameter 1, value 1), the LED stays on as expected now.
* Fixed a bug: The ZEN30 relay button direct association group 2 for basic on/off commands is working as expected now.
* Improved Direct Association Group 3 for the multilevel set functionality.
* Added Advanced Parameter 34: Disable the LED blinking when a setting is changed.
